short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SimpFocus is a free site blocker that empowers users to selectively block entire domains, URLs, or create whitelists for websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimpFocus is a completely free, easy-to-use, and lightweight site blocker that empowers users to selectively block entire domains, URLs, or create whitelists for preferred websites. Additionally, SimpFocus allows you to set up timed work sessions and breaks to enhance productivity and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

All features are free to use, but donate is appreciate.

Features:
ðŸ“Œ Block All Social or Adults Websites:
Empower yourself to effortlessly block distracting or inappropriate content with just a simple toggle. Take control of your online environment and stay focused on what matters most.

ðŸ“Œ Customizable Block 
Tailor your web-blocking experience by choosing to block websites based on domains or specific URLs of your choice. With no limits, you have the freedom to exert complete control over what you want to restrict, ensuring a personalized browsing experience.

ðŸ“Œ Whitelist
Sometimes you need to block an entire website but still access specific pages. With SimpFocus, you can whitelist specific pages, giving you the flexibility to customize your browsing experience to suit your needs.

ðŸ“Œ Pomodoro
Boost your productivity with the Pomodoro technique integrated directly into SimpFocus. Set up timed work sessions and breaks to maintain focus, increase efficiency, and prevent burnout. Take advantage of a structured work and rest cycle that aligns with your natural workflow.

ðŸ“Œ Minimal Tab
SimpFocus understands the importance of a clutter-free browsing experience. When accessing a blocked site, instead of cluttering your workspace with new tabs, SimpFocus efficiently redirects you to the designated page. This minimalist approach ensures that your browsing remains streamlined, preventing the unnecessary accumulation of tabs and contributing to a clean and focused digital environment. 

ðŸ‘¤The chrome extension is best for:
- Students aspiring to reduce distractions and concentrate on their studies.
- Individuals grappling with online addiction, seeking to restrict access to specific websites.


SimpFocus is your go-to solution for creating a distraction-free digital environment tailored to your preferences. Whether you aim to enhance productivity by blocking specific websites or establish a structured work routine with Pomodoro sessions, SimpFocus is here to help you stay focused and in control. And the best part? It's completely free for everyone. 

While all features are free to use, your donation is greatly appreciated, supporting our commitment to providing accessible productivity tools for all.

With SimpFocus, it's not just about blocking distractions; it's about doing so seamlessly and with minimal disruption to your workflow. Stay focused, stay organized, and let SimpFocus handle the rest. Install SimpFocus today and take the first step toward a more focused and balanced digital life.

Please be aware that using the toggle to block Social or Adults Websites may not encompass all sites. However, you can always include any new site you wish to block in the customized list.
